iBusiness Solution, LLC., (IBS) founded in year 2000, is a Certified Minority and disadvantaged Small business (MBE/DBE) in multiple US States and an emerging global IT services provider with a footprint across Americas and Asia-Pacific. We have a large amount of experience in delivering cutting-edge technology solutions to clients worldwide. In last 3 years IBS has grown 100% with its professional focus, quality of services, and dedication and client satisfaction. Our delivery of the services is backed by our strong team of professionals, committed management and executive team and goodwill earned from our clients over the last 15 years.•	Taking the requirements from sales/business development/account managers.•	Full-fledged technical recruiting from sourcing resumes, to technically screening candidates negotiating rates, scheduling and co-coordinating interviews, checking references for IT, NON IT, Functional, Technical and Engineering positions.•	Responsible for full requirement cycle that includes getting resumes and submissions for requirements for US operations.•	Handle entire Recruitment cycle which includes sourcing, Identifying, interviewing, evaluating, pre-screening and recruiting candidates through internal built application tracking system (ATS,), Job Portals (Dice, Monster, Corp-Corp etc.), Networking sites (LinkedIn, etc.) and Third Party vendors.•	Sourcing profiles from job portals, references, LinkedIn, Mass mails response, add post for suitable profile as per the requirement.•	Exclusively recruited on W2 and C2C for Corning, Citiustech, Volt, GE, NBC and CMC, for both IT and Non IT Requirements.•	Negotiated rates/salaries on different tax terms Corp-Corp and W2.•	Involved in the full life cycle of the Recruitment Process starting from sourcing, screening, evaluation, initial interviews, follow-ups, offers and closures.

e-Solutions Inc. is a talent-driven consulting company providing individual consultants, project teams, and strategic outsourcing services to clients in a wide range of industries. We leverage our recruiting expertise to deliver high-end consulting services for a variety of engagements.Roles & Responsibilities:-Working on Technical IT requirements Understanding the job description given by the various US clients.Handling requirement on domain i.e. financial, banking, retail, insurance.Candidate search using various job sites like Dice, Monster, LinkedIn, Indeed etc. Screening all the candidates profiles and calls them for the requirement.Handling all technical requirements like Architect (.Net, java, BI, data warehouse), Project Manager (test manager, Business intelligence), Developers, quality analyst, business analyst, oracle etcShort listing potential candidates resumes and Hire C2C, W2, 1099, H1 candidates, work for contract and permanent position.

IBS is a global business and information technology consulting firm providing services via professional consulting, outsourcing and staff augmentation delivery channels for the targeted verticals.Responsibilities:Working on the full lifecycle of US Recruitment. Working on many job portals like Dice, Monster, Corp to Corp, Conrep,. Maintaining our database regularly in proper excel sheets and marinating the relationship with our candidates.Clients On which worked so far….Deloitte Consulting, Commonwealth of PA, Commonwealth of MAWorking for Deloitte.

•	Managed entire recruitment process based on changing priorities and client needs.•	Sourced candidates from various job portals such as Dice, Monster, TechFetch, Career Builder and internal company database to find right candidates depending on work location, pay rates, skill sets, experience level, availability and job profile.•	Interviewed pre-qualified, negotiated offers and closed hires. Performed reference checks.•	Prescreened candidates with detailed phone-screens evaluating candidate’s compatibility with specific job requirements, ensuring a right fit, prior to submission to the client.•	Worked closely with client managers to ensure effective communications, timely resume submittals to achieve high-level of customer satisfaction. •	Recruited for permanent, full time, contract and contract to hire opportunities.

summary: Sourcing the Candidates through Job Portals, reference etc. in stipulated time frame.• Contact eligible candidates for interviews & follow ups • Coordination with Candidates and Clients.• Responsible for the Coordination for Joining of Candidates.•	 Short listing and screening of CV• Pr-Screening the candidate.• Sending appropriate profile matching to client requirements• Arranging interviews.• Coordinating with the Client , candidates•	Worked on contract requirements only for client Deloitte •	Responsible for the negotiating Salary as per US Taxation terms like; 1099(independent), W-2 and Corp 2 Corp. • Performed expert full life cycle recruitment of employees and contractors, across all functional areas of the enterprise, from executive level to individual contributor utilizing Networking, Cold Calling, Industry Networking, User Groups, Recruiting Databases, Internet Searches, Job Boards (Corp 2 Corp Portal).•	Created Human Resources documentation such as job descriptions, technical interview ratings, interview collection documentation. •	Negotiated compensation packages, assessing relevant experience, education, skills and personal qualifications to determine pay type/rate, relocation benefits and other benefits. •	Correspond with job applicants to notify them of opportunities and perform initial phone/e-mail interview screenings. •	Interview, pre-qualify, pre-close, close and recommend to Account Managers what is necessary to close potential candidates. •	Analytical contributor with regard to problem solving and team troubleshooting.
